comments:
build I20030115

Noticed there were several errors in the log which had happened several hours 
previously, so I won't be able to give you exact steps.
However, I was most likely doing a merge of a file with conflicting changes 
between workspace and server, copying individual changes from right to left.

Here are the stack traces:

Kai, I believe thats the child/base document issue that we had on MacOS X.

This issue is different from the one we've seen on the Mac. The stack trace is 
a normal child/parent document collaboration. The only plausible reason that 
this can fail is that the projection scope of the child document is moved based 
on the parent document change. The child document interprets the parent change 
in its own world but does not consider the possibility of a shifted projection 
scope. This is fixed in build > I20030213.
